article_title: Airport warns of COVID-19 case on Sunwing flight that landed in Moncton
article_description: The Moncton airport is alerting passengers about another Prince Edward Island resident who tested positive for COVID 19 after being on a flight to Moncton
article_content: The Moncton airport is alerting passengers about another Prince Edward Island resident who tested positive for COVID 19 after being on a flight to Moncton In a press release  the Greater Moncton International Airport Authority said the person passed through   785 chars
